description: Rafiki Eco Solutions Limited focuses on producing eco-friendly charcoal briquettes from biomass waste. The initiative aims to reduce deforestation, manage waste, and provide affordable cooking energy. By converting agricultural and market waste into clean cooking fuel, Rafiki not only addresses environmental concerns but also creates job opportunities in the community. The briquettes offer a cost-effective and healthier alternative to traditional charcoal, promoting sustainable practices in cooking.
name: Rafiki Eco Solutions Limited
